name: Principles of Management
description: Learn the core concepts of planning, organizing, leading, and controlling within an organization.

name: Introduction to Business Strategy
description: Understand strategic management fundamentals and how companies gain a competitive edge.

name: Financial Accounting Fundamentals
description: A beginner-friendly guide to financial statements and accounting principles.

name: Marketing Management
description: Explore marketing strategy, customer behavior, and brand positioning.

name: Entrepreneurship in Emerging Economies
description: How entrepreneurs drive growth and innovation in developing markets.

name: Operations Management
description: Learn how to manage processes, logistics, and production efficiency in organizations.

name: Organizational Behavior
description: Understand how people interact within companies and how culture impacts performance.

name: Business Analytics Foundations
description: Learn how data analysis supports better business decision-making.

name: Human Resource Management
description: Recruitment, motivation, and performance management essentials.

name: Corporate Finance Essentials
description: Dive into capital budgeting, financial ratios, and valuation techniques.

name: Leadership and Influence
description: Build leadership and communication skills for team and project management.

name: Project Management Fundamentals
description: Learn project planning, execution, and stakeholder management.

name: Sustainability and Corporate Responsibility
description: Understand how companies create value ethically and sustainably.

name: Economics for Managers
description: Analyze markets, pricing, and economic systems relevant to business management.

name: Strategic Innovation and Change Management
description: Managing organizational transformation and fostering innovation.
